com.skyisland.questmanager.quest

Class Goal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skyisland.questmanager.quest.Goal

  • public class Goal
extends java.lang.Object
    Tracks objectives in a quest. Goals have specific requirements that must be met before they are considered clear.
